data.title: Latest news, views, pictures, video
data.meta_description: Julia Roberts shot to fame following the huge success of Pretty Woman in 1990, with the actress going on to star in dozens of blockbusters including Notting Hill, Oceans 11, and Closer. Julia won the Oscar for Best Actress for her role in Erin Brockovich and is considered one of Hollywood’s leading actresses.
data.text:
James Corden discusses challenges of The Late Late Show and his new venture into podcasting

I'm a fashion writer and this Pretty Woman-inspired dress from M&S is perfect for summer

Will Young says 'awful' encounter with Julia Roberts makes him 'break out into a cold sweat'

All the best romantic films you can watch on Disney Plus this Valentine's Day

Julia Roberts shot to fame following the huge success of Pretty Woman in 1990, with the actress going on to star in dozens of blockbusters including Notting Hill, Oceans 11, and Closer. Julia won the Oscar for Best Actress for her role in Erin Brockovich and is considered one of Hollywood’s leading actresses.
